name: Cradle
author: Will Wight
title: Cradle
sentence: Lindon is Unsouled and forbidden to learn the sacred arts, so he forges his own Path.
description: Cultivation. The current King of Progression Fantasy. Staggeringly good. Amazing characters, strong motivation, a beautiful system, rich world, and fast pace, it's a dream come true to read.

name: Mother of Learning
author: nobody13
title: Mother of Learning
sentence: Zorian Kazinski has all the time in the world to get stronger, and he plans on taking full advantage of it.
description: Progression fantasy, and time loops done right. Smart MC, great plot, varied magic systems. Groundhog day has nothing on this.

name: Mage Errant
author: John Bierce
title: Mage Errant
sentence: Hugh of Emblin is, so far as he's concerned, the worst student that the Academy at Skyhold has ever seen.
description: Progression fantasy, some academic focused books. A struggling protagonist gets dragged into adventure. Characters are people who grow both in power, abilities, and as people. I appreciate this a lot.

name: Iron Prince
author: Bryce O'Connor
title: Iron Prince
sentence: Reidon Ward will become a god. He doesn't know it yet, of course.
description: Scifi/progression/LitRPG crossover in an academic settings. Who needs magic when you have funky alien tech that gives you  the best of fantasy and LitRPG in one swoop.

name: Dungeon Crawler Carl
author: Matt Dinniman
title: Dungeon Crawler Carl
sentence: A sadistic game where survival depends on killing your prey in the most entertaining way possible.
description: System apocalypse LitRPG. Carl and Princess Donut are the real power couple I never knew I needed. Great pair dynamics, crazy hijinks, and just the right amount of larger plot.

name: Arcane Ascension
author: Andrew Rowe
title: Arcane Ascension
sentence: Corin Cadence searches for his brother, who disappeared in the Serpent Spire.
description: Progression fantasy in academic setting. Great world, detailed magic, intelligent characters, extraordinarily fun. Crafting and spire/dungeon focus.

name: Thrones of the Fallen
author: Phil Tucker
title: Thrones of the Fallen
sentence: Harald needs to follow in his father's footsteps and become one of the greatest dungeon delvers of all time.
description: Dungeon delving LitRPG with heavy focus on characters and great worldbuilding. Excellent dialogue and action.

name: Super Supportive
author: Sleyca
title: Super Supportive
sentence: Everyone wants to be a superhero. Including Alden Thorn.
description: Modern superhero / System mashup with amazing writing, characters, and worldbuilding.

name: Bastion
author: Phil Tucker
title: Bastion
sentence: Scorio will rise from the ashes to conquer the ten layers of hell.
description: Cultivation with only slight academic focus. A great mix of classic progression with some top tier worldbuilding. The world is unique and interesting, characters empathetic, and their struggles all too real.

name: The First Chronicles of Druss the Legend
author: David Gemmell
title: The First Chronicles of Druss the Legend
sentence: Druss the Legend. Deathwalker. Captain of the Axe. This is his story.
description: Progression-fantasy adjacent woodcutter-to-hero arc where we follow Druss as he carves his legend and searches for his kidnapped wife.

name: Mark of the Fool
author: J.M. Clarke
title: Mark of the Fool
sentence: Alex Roth is called by the gods to be a hero. He declines.
description: Academic-focused progression fantasy with analytical MC, great characters and innovative thinking. I am such a sucker for good magic academy books, and this is one of the greats.

name: The Scholomance Series
author: Naomi Novik
title: The Scholomance Series
sentence: Forget the hordes of monsters and cursed artifacts in the Scholomance, El's the most dangerous thing in the place.
description: Fantasy series, female lead in a magic school with an 50% mortality rate, because they get eaten by the maleficaria. A unique and refreshing take on magic schools. PF-adjacent.

name: The Years of Apocalypse
author: UraniumPhoenix
title: The Years of Apocalypse
sentence: Mirian finds herself caught in a time loop and haunted by dreams of the Elder Gods.
description: Time loops with a clever female MC, deep worldbuilding, and a plot that has more layers than the world's largest onion.

name: CyberGene: Blood and Steel
author: Sixbees2
title: CyberGene: Blood and Steel
sentence: Upgrade. Consume. Evolve. Whether it’s cybernetics or mutations, this world demands you be more than human.
description: A cyberpunk story with two MCs that get their powers from the same gold MAL. Biomod and crafting focus.

name: Ghost in the City
author: Seras
title: Ghost in the City
sentence: Self insert into the Cyberpunk 2077 gamer system and enjoy the chaos.
description: Isekai into the Cyperpunk 2077 game world with the character you know and love. Grind, gain levels, gather new chooms, and flatline some gonks.

name: Sky Pride
author: Warby Picus
title: Sky Pride
sentence: It's a long road from a cripple living in a literal dump to soaring through the heavens.
description: Deep cultivation story with good prose, great characters, and frustratingly tantalising hooks.

name: The Calamitous Bob
author: Mecanimus
title: The Calamitous Bob
sentence: A divine spat leaves Viv stranded in the middle of an arcane disaster zone crawling with undead.
description: Female-lead isekai where the MC is portaled into a dead kingdom overrun with powerful undead.

name: Red Rising
author: Pierce Brown
title: Red Rising
sentence: Darrow is a Helldiver. A pioneer of Mars. Born to slave beneath the earth so that one day, future generations might live above it.
description: PF-adjacent dystopian sci-fi story where humanity is stratified into Colours, with the masses oppressed by the Golds.

name: Beneath the Dragoneye Moons
author: Selkie Myth
title: Beneath the Dragoneye Moons
sentence: Elaine is reincarnated in Pallos, and uses her Earth knowledge to become the ultimate healer.
description: Epic fantasy isekai with a healing-focused female-lead. Some magic school in books eight and nine.

name: The Weirkey Chronicles
author: Sarah Lin
title: The Weirkey Chronicles
sentence: A truly unique cultivation system with an amazing setting.
description: Soft cultivation / isekai crossover with a unique magic system and expansive setting. If there's one thing I always love about Sarah Lin, its her worldbuilding. And now, she's written my favourite magic system as well.

name: Apocalypse Parenting
author: Erin Ampersand
title: Apocalypse Parenting
sentence: What's a mom to do when a system apocalypse arrives on Earth?
description: LitRPG system apocalypse where Meghan just wants to survive it with her kids.

name: Rise of the Living Forge
author: Actus
title: Rise of the Living Forge
sentence: The Hero of Man tries to retire to a life of blacksmithing.
description: Crafting-heavy blacksmith fiction where a former hero just wants to be left alone.

name: Portal to Nova Roma
author: J.R. Mathews
title: Portal to Nova Roma
sentence: Alexander the AI makes a fresh start in a new magical dimension.
description: Portal fantasy with an AI MC who uses his technology knowledge to get ahead in a ravaged, magical world.

name: Beware of Chicken
author: CasualFarmer
title: Beware of Chicken
sentence: A laugh-out-loud, slice-of-life martial-arts fantasy about . . . farming????
description: Slice of life cultivation novel, very wholesome, about a reincarnated person trying to get away from Xianxia tropes. Incredibly wholesome and a pure delight to read.

name: Jake's Magical Market
author: J.R. Mathews
title: Jake's Magical Market
sentence: Meddling gods. A magical card system. An apocalypse no one could have predicted.
description: System apocalypse LitRPG. Initially a card-based LitRPG system, Jake's Magical Market is a very fun read, just don't expect too much markets and expect a lot of chaotic shenanigans!

name: Heretical Fishing
author: Haylock Jobson
title: Heretical Fishing
sentence: A world abandoned by the gods, mystifying cosmic forces, and a hero who would rather... go fishing???
description: Slice-of-life and wholesome story where Fischer just wants to fish.

name: Vainqueur the Dragon
author: Maxime J. Durand
title: Vainqueur the Dragon
sentence: When a would-be thief tells Vainqueur  about "classes," "levels," and "quests," Vainqueur wonders if he should change career.
description: Comedy LitRPG where our MCs are an ancient red dragon and an isekai'd man pressured in raiding his hoard.

name: Rock Falls, Everyone Dies
author: zechamp
title: Rock Falls, Everyone Dies
sentence: By a stroke of fate, a stone gains sentience and sets out on a grand quest to touch grass.
description: LitRPG and cultivation parody about a sentient rock rolling down a mountain.

name: Virtuous Sons
author: Y.B. Striker
title: Virtuous Sons
sentence: The Scarlett Son and Son of Rome shake the heavens.
description: Cultivation in a Greco-Roman setting, with amazing characters and absolutely fantastic dynamics.

name: Stray Cat Strut
author: Ravensdagger
title: Stray Cat Strut
sentence: During an  alien invasion in a cyberpunk world, Cat is chosen by the Protector's to join the Vanguard, become a Samurai, and help save those she loves.
description: Cyberpunk + system apocalypse fusion where we follow Catherine, who is chosen to be one of humanity's Samurai and lead the fight against the alien incursion.

name: Changeling
author: Mecanimus
title: Changeling
sentence: Nestra substitutes a core for anger in the battle against kaiju and monsters.
description: Sci-fi cyberpunk-esque grimdark with cultivation themes as humanity fends off portals and kaiju.

name: Cyber Dreams
author: Plum Parrot
title: Cyber Dreams
sentence: Juliet gets an angelic AI in her head. If only it wasn't stolen!
description: A cyberpunk story where a down-on-her luck welder gets a personal AI assistant thats out of this world.

name: Godclads
author: OstensibleMammal
title: Godclads
sentence: Bred as a weapon, the ghoul Avo finds himself resurrected from death.
description: Dystopian sci-fi fusion with eldritch horror following a non-human MC.

name: Titan Hoppers
author: Rob J. Hayes
title: Titan Hoppers
sentence: The fleet finds a titan, and Iro finds his power.
description: A character-driven sci-fi story about a fleet of ships surviving by scavenging off planet-sized titans.

name: Accidental Champion
author: Todd Herzman
title: Accidental Champion
sentence: He didn't plan on becoming a top champion of the world. Then, the System arrived...
description: LitRPG system apocalypse with an OP MC mage.

name: Antimage
author: Alexander Olson
title: Antimage
sentence: A scientist from another world. A mage seeking deadly knowledge. A power that could topple an empire.
description: LitRPG isekai with a PhD protag that uses his Earth knowledge to pull ahead.

name: My Best Friend is an Eldritch Horror
author: Actus
title: My Best Friend is an Eldritch Horror
sentence: Damien nearly ended the world. Now, his mistake might be the only thing that can save it.
description: LitRPG focused on Damien and his Eldritch companion in a magic school setting.

name: The Enchanter
author: Tobias Begley
title: The Enchanter
sentence: Evan heads to Yesgol Academy of Magic, a place filled with the children of the elite, and the occasional extraplanar horror.
description: Progression fantasy. Crafting, intelligent protagonists, school setting, it's right up my alley.

name: How to Defeat a Demon King in Ten Easy Steps
author: Andrew Rowe
title: How to Defeat a Demon King in Ten Easy Steps
sentence: The Hero is late, and the Demon King's hordes have almost conquered humanity.
description: Hilarious LitRPG. A love letter to Zelda, this story is a humorous LitRPG take on if an actual video game story came to life.

name: Corruption Wielder
author: Aaron Shih
title: Corruption Wielder
sentence: Will's tutorial goes a bit wrong. A bit... corrupted.
description: LitRPG system apocalypse story where another planet gets merged with Earth and Will ends up wielding the forbidden powers of corruption.

name: Return of the Runebound Professor
author: Actus
title: Return of the Runebound Professor
sentence: Lives are a currency, and Noah Vines is rich.
description: Magic academy isekai where the MC gets a shiny new body on death.

name: Edge Cases
author: Silver Linings
title: Edge Cases
sentence: A team of adventurers manage to break the system. Oops.
description: LitRPG dungeon-delving squad with inventive skills.

name: Stargazer's War
author: J. P. Valentine
title: Stargazer's War
sentence: Caliban Rex gazes into the void, dying, and realises he can cultivate the power there.
description: Sect-based cultivation novel with a sci-fi bend. Strong characters and good prose, plus a setting that is begging to be explored further.

name: Salvos
author: MelasDelta
title: Salvos
sentence: Can Salvos, a newborn demon, survive the swarms of the Nethworld? When cast to the human realm, will she find her way home?
description: LitRPG portal fantasy where the MC is a demon lost in the world of mortals.

name: Cinnamon Bun
author: RavensDagger
title: Cinnamon Bun
sentence: Broccoli Bunch goes on a cute and wholesome adventure.
description: A wholesome isekai in a LitRPG world wherein our female lead goes on friendship-making adventures. If you're burnt out with psychopathic MCs... this will cleanse your palette. Light-hearted, wholesome, and incredibly cute.

name: The Perfect Run
author: Maxime J. Durand
title: The Perfect Run
sentence: Quicksave is an adventurer with a strange power: he can create a save-point in time and redo his life whenever he dies.
description: Fantasy series focusing on time loops and a diverse cast of super-powered characters trying to save the world... or end it. Great characterisation and imaginative powers: awesome.

name: The First Law of Cultivation
author: KrazeKode
title: The First Law of Cultivation
sentence: In this world, knowledge is power. And power is everything.
description: Sect and alchemy focused cultivation isekai novel with lots of spirit companions.

name: Edge of the Woods
author: Andrew Rowe
title: Edge of the Woods
sentence: A young swordsman must retrieve a magical blade—and learn the truth about his past.
description: Progression fantasy origin story in a fae setting. Character focused, low stakes, and slife-of-life.

name: Dawn of the Void
author: Phil Tucker
title: Dawn of the Void
sentence: With the dawn of the Void, James will become the most important person to have ever lived.
description: System apocalypse LitRPG with a focus on squad battles and the collapse of society.

name: Azarinth Healer
author: Rhaegar
title: Azarinth Healer
sentence: Ilea adjusts to a new fantasy world by becoming a battle healer.
description: A lone-MC isekai with non-stop action, overpowered MC, and a massive backlog.

name: Wish upon the stars
author: Malcolm Tent
title: Wish upon the stars
sentence: By granting wishes, Shane can gain skills, items, and stat points. His growth potential seems limitless.
description: A LitRPG/cultivation superhero story in a sci-fi setting where the MC's ability is to grant wishes

name: Millennial Mage
author: J.L. Mullins
title: Millennial Mage
sentence: Tala eats food, drinks coffee, and wrecks monsters. Her terrorbird helps. Thanks Terry.
description: A female-led, slice-of-life, character-driven story with a unique magic system and worldbuilding.

name: Umbral Storm
author: Alec Huston
title: Umbral Storm
sentence: Deryn escapes from servitude and joins the Sharded Few.
description: A sect style western cultivation with multiple PoVs and rich worldbuilding.

name: DIE. RESPAWN. REPEAT.
author: SilverLinings
title: DIE. RESPAWN. REPEAT.
sentence: Every time he dies, Ethan Hill gains a little more power.
description: Isekai story of Ethan who is trapped in a time loop trial when Earth is integrated.

name: Mana Mirror
author: Tobias Begley
title: Mana Mirror
sentence: Malachi stumbles into an apprenticeship to the powerful Occultist Orykson, even if the man sees him only as a tool.
description: Coming of age progression fantasy (in both senses of the word, FtM MC) with a deep magic system and varied characters.

name: We are Legion
author: Dennis E. Taylor
title: We are Legion
sentence: Bob becomes a replicating spaceship.
description: PF adjacent sci-fi, about reincarnation as a computer program sent to colonise the stars.

name: Desolada - A Blade Through Time
author: Louis Kalman
title: Desolada - A Blade Through Time
sentence: Leones can reverse time an hour, a power he discovered only when Magisters burned his family alive.
description: Grimdark Progression fantasy with small-scale time reversing powers and rich worldbuilding.

name: The Path of Ascension
author: C. Mantis
title: The Path of Ascension
sentence: Matt meets a mysterious couple, who sponsor him on the Path of Ascension.
description: Scifi cultivation. It's not often we see wuxia in space. It's not common we see it done well, either.

name: Minute Mage
author: Reg Rome
title: Minute Mage
sentence: Arlan gains a time-based class and manages to piss off a *lot* of demons.
description: LitRPG where our MC gains access to a legendary Minute Mage class and can create time loops.

name: Ghost of the Truthseeker
author: Strungbound
title: Ghost of the Truthseeker
sentence: Earth is initiated, and Alistair finds himself in a dangerous new world…
description: LitRPG, cultivation, and system apocalypse hybrid following our magical pugilist Alistair.

name: The World According to Dragons
author: Harmon Cooper
title: The World According to Dragons
sentence: Twillo and Adventus herald the re-coming of the Age of Dragons.
description: Light progression featuring a relic hunting dragon-rider. Rich worldbuilding combining multiple mythologies and a fusion of cultivation and Indiana Jones.

name: He Who Fights With Monsters
author: Shirtaloon
title: He Who Fights With Monsters
sentence: Jason wakes up in a mysterious world of magic and monsters.
description: Portal LitRPG. The story has plenty of humour and a protagonist that drags his moral soapbox in chains behind him.

name: Never Die Twice
author: Void Herald
title: Never Die Twice
sentence: Walter Tye will destroy death, even if he has to kill everyone first.
description: Necromancer-focused story about defeating death for everyone so no one ends being tortured in Helheim.

name: Victor of Tucson
author: Plum Parrot
title: Victor of Tucson
sentence: Victor's summoned from Earth, sold into slavery, and put to work in the ring. Bad luck.
description: Isekai LitRPG where Victor is summoned from Earth and immediately sold to a fighting ring.

name: Queen in the Mud
author: Maari
title: Queen in the Mud
sentence: Naomi finds herself reincarnated as a salamander.
description: LitRPG isekai where Naomi is reborn as a salamander in uncharted wilderness.

name: Unbound
author: Nicoli Gonnella
title: Unbound
sentence: Felix is Unbound, an anomoly summoned to the world, there to uncover ancient secrets and power.
description: An action-heavy LitRPG isekai following Felix and his chimera companion pit in a world of primordials, gods, and lost races.

name: Eternal Ephemera
author: Davis Ashura
title: Eternal Ephemera
sentence: Cam and his panda-friend head to the Ephemeral Academy.
description: A school based cultivation story with a strong emphasis on tactical team combat, and a small and well-developed cast of characters.

name: An Outcast In Another World
author: KamikazePotato
title: An Outcast In Another World
sentence: Rob gets sucked into another world as gods play games.
description: Your typical isekai LitRPG novel that only gets better as it goes on through rich characters, good humour, and a great overaching plot.

name: Somnia Online
author: K.T. Hanna
title: Somnia Online
sentence: Somnia Online, the fully immersive vrmmo run by secretive AIs.
description: Female-lead LitRPG vrmmo series about exploring the AI run world of Somnia Online. If you like other VR MMO books, read this.

name: Defiance of the Fall
author: TheFirstDefier
title: Defiance of the Fall
sentence: Zac was alone in the middle of the forest when the world changed...
description: System apocalypse LitRPG. A multiverse spanning series with great hooks, even if there's some deus ex machina and some editing issues.

name: Shattered Gods
author: Chris Fox
title: Shattered Gods
sentence: Fated to destroy the world. Determined to save it.
description: Progression fantasy, academy focus in book two on. A strong core dynamic between Xal and Saghir and lots of travelling.

name: Bog Standard Isekai
author: Miles English
title: Bog Standard Isekai
sentence: Isekai into a swamp town filled with undead. Immediately regret your choice.
description: Isekai into a swamp filled with undead. Immediately regret your choice. Try to survive in your stupid 12yo body.

name: Never Fade Away
author: Ideas-Guy
title: Never Fade Away
sentence: L-15, experimental human testbed for the megacorps, escapes his orphanage of hell. He'll need to grow stronger to return and free the other children.
description: Cyberpunk2077 and Mass Effect fan-fic with a crafting focused MC.

name: Casteless
author: Peppersquash
title: Casteless
sentence: Card fighting with the power of chaos.
description: Card-fighting LitRPG where the MC has a chaos-luck themed primary card.

name: All The Skills
author: Honour Rae
title: All The Skills
sentence: When fate grants Arthur a Master of Skills card, he's thrust into a world of opportunity and danger.
description: LitRPG deckbuilding system, where the MC gets a Legendary card as a child. Also dragon riders.

name: Art of the Adept
author: Michael G. Manning
title: Art of the Adept
sentence: In a world run by sorcerers, Will becomes the ultimate wizard.
description: Cross Magician with progression fantasy themes, and then work in the harsh reality of the world with a Robin-Hobb-style, gut-punching ending.

name: The Primal Hunter
author: Zogarth
title: The Primal Hunter
sentence: On just another average day, Jake finds himself in a forest filled with monsters, dangers, and opportunity...
description: System apocalypse LitRPG, with all the normal bells and whistles. Plenty of chapters on Royal Road, with the MC being OP and stomping everything.

name: Solo Levelling
author: Chugong
title: Solo Levelling
sentence: The weakest hunter of all mankind! E-rank hunter Jinwoo Sung has no money, no talent, until...
description: System LitRPG...ish. Perfect wish fulfilment - a world wherein everyone's power is fixed, but you alone can grow stronger.

name: Ultimate Level 1
author: Shawn Wilson
title: Ultimate Level 1
sentence: LitRPG where Max gets a forbidden black skill: Consume.
description: LitRPG where Max gets a forbidden black skill: Consume.

name: Saintess Summons Skeletons
author: Mornn
title: Saintess Summons Skeletons
sentence: She wanted to be a Necromancer, but awakened as a Saint! Somehow her summoned heroes are all undead?
description: LitRPG story following a necromancer + summon hero class mashup.

name: The Impeccable Adventure of the Reluctant Dungeon
author: Lise Eclaire
title: The Impeccable Adventure of the Reluctant Dungeon
sentence: After getting reincarnated as a dungeon, Theodor thought he’d finally get some rest and relaxation. He was wrong.
description: Dungeon-core + adventurer hybrid story with an impulsive and overpowered MC.

name: Dear Spellbook
author: Peter J Lee
title: Dear Spellbook
sentence: Tal's parents were murdered and now he's stuck in a time loop. His luck is not good.
description: D&D inspired time-loop adventure with a sorcerous MC.

name: Reborn as a Demonic Tree
author: Xkarnation
title: Reborn as a Demonic Tree
sentence: If you're going to reborn as a tree, a daily sign in system works out pretty well.
description: Isekai cultivation novel with a daily sign in LitRPG system about a man reborn, you guessed it, as a demonic tree.

name: Odyssey of the Ethereal
author: Jamie Kojola
title: Odyssey of the Ethereal
sentence: Armed with the power of regeneration and a fierce determination, Aetheria sets out to climb the Ten Towers and fulfill her destiny.
description: LitRPG game reincarnation with a female-lead, and cat-dragon pet.

name: Oh Great! I was Reincarnated as a Farmer
author: Benjamin Kerei
title: Oh Great! I was Reincarnated as a Farmer
sentence: A gamer reincarnated in a world with fixed classes. And he is a farmer.
description: A LitRPG isekai about (not) being a farmer and trying your hardest to game the system instead.

name: Seventh Bridge to the Heavens
author: T.J. Reynold
title: Seventh Bridge to the Heavens
sentence: Once a soldier, now an outcast. Luca must overcome fate as he walks the path of a cultivator.
description: A cultivation story with the faintest hint of LitRPG, featuring elemental powers and great worldbuilding.

name: Lightblade
author: Zamil Akhtar
title: Lightblade
sentence: In three days, Jyosh will slay the God Emperor, or die trying.
description: Progression fantasy, inception/matrix themes mixed in with some hints of Indo-Persian mythology. The world of dreams are filled with twists and turns, and the plot of this book is no exception.

name: The Brightest Shadow
author: Sarah Lin
title: The Brightest Shadow
sentence: The arrival of the Hero was worse than anyone could have imagined.
description: Epic fantasy with some progression. The Chosen One trope is delightfully flipped on its head.

name: Threadbare
author: Andrew Seiple
title: Threadbare
sentence: Meetreadbare. He is twelve inches tall, full of fluff, and really, really bad at being a hero.
description: LitRPG fantasy. A delightful and aggressively adorable take on the genre. A sentient golem teddy bears searching for their kidnapped child, teaming up with the household cat.

name: Forge of Destiny
author: Yrsillar
title: Forge of Destiny
sentence: A young girl from the slums is found to have the Talent to become an Immortal.
description: Slice-of-life cultivation. Academia/sect focus. Chill read with slower pacing and lower stakes.

name: Completionist Chronicles
author: Dakota Krout
title: Completionist Chronicles
sentence: A game that puts all others to shame, and a man willing to learn no matter the cost.
description: World-system LitRPG. Fun read with an interesting cast. Ignore the weird opening about Elon Musk. A chill, fun read.

name: Night Angel
author: Brent Weeks
title: Night Angel
sentence: The perfect kiler has no friends. Only targets.
description: This trilogy follows Azoth/Kylar and his growth from street rat to deadly assassin.

name: 1% Lifesteal
author: Robert Blaise
title: 1% Lifesteal
sentence: In a world of countless enemies, Freddy's unique power will help him thrive.
description: Dystopian scifi cultivation mashup with a tortured MC

name: Elydes
author: Drew Wells
title: Elydes
sentence: To not let his humble rebirth define him, Kai will need to find the determination to grow stronger so that he may delve into the mysteries of Elydes.
description: Slower burn LitRPG reincarnation with slice-of-life elements and lots of training.

name: All the Dust that Falls
author: Zaifyr
title: All the Dust that Falls
sentence: All those who stand before Spot will be swept away.
description: LitRPG isekai where a robo-vacuum is sent to a fantasy world. More serious than a parody.

name: Quest Academy
author: Brian J Nordon
title: Quest Academy
sentence: A world infested by demons. An Academy to train Heroes. A new student’s power could make all the difference.
description: A scifi academy story with humanity under assult from demons, featuring a very overpowered protagonist.

name: Shadow Slave
author: Guiltythree
title: Shadow Slave
sentence: Sunny is chosen by the Nightmare Spell and becomes Awakened..
description: A cultivation/LitRPG mashup where Awakened protect the world from Nightmare creatures in the dream realm.

name: And (N)one Shall Remain
author: Avitue
title: And (N)one Shall Remain
sentence: Four champions are summoned from Earth, and one is shown the truth of the system.
description: LitRPG group reincarnation with two main POVs, with the characters placed against each other.

name: Martial Peak
author: Momo
title: Martial Peak
sentence: Yang Kai goes from trainee disciple to shattering the heavens.
description: Traditional cultivation manhua packed with action-packed, gorgeous art... and multiple wives.

name: RE: Monarch
author: J. McCoy
title: RE: Monarch
sentence: Cairn is cured with time loops and some seriously unwinnable scenarios.
description: A time-loop novel heavy on politics and intrigue with complex characters.

name: Skitterdoc 2077
author: SpiraSpira
title: Skitterdoc 2077
sentence: Cyberpunk 2077 and Worm had a kid, and she was born with a medical Tinker degree.
description: Cyberpunk2077 and Worm crossover fanfic with a medical-focused Tink MC.

name: The Immaculate Collection
author: havlo
title: The Immaculate Collection
sentence: Reid Aveno dreams of traveling the world and becoming a merchant.
description: Slice-of-life merchant progression where Reid becomes store manager for a famous retired adventurer.

name: The Tower Unbroken
author: Michael Nwanolue
title: The Tower Unbroken
sentence: African inspired cultivation. Somadina starts his journey.
description: A Cradle-inspired cultivation story set in a fantasy world with African roots.

name: The Legend of Randidly Ghosthound
author: Noret Flood
title: The Legend of Randidly Ghosthound
sentence: Randidly wakes up to a new Earth, with Levels, Skills, monsters, and the possibility of death...
description: System apocalypse LitRPG. The System takes over Earth, and Randidly becomes a Heretic. The plot goes off the rails, but you might like that.

name: Rogue Dungeon
author: James A. Hunter
title: Rogue Dungeon
sentence: Build. Evolve. Conquer. Welcome to the Dungeon...
description: Reincarnation fantasy LitRPG. Not Dungeon Core despite the name, but a fun dungeon-based settings.

name: Awaken Online
author: Travis Bagwell
title: Awaken Online
sentence: Jason logs into Awaken Online fed-up with reality. This game is his ticket to power and freedom.
description: VR LitRPG with necromancer focus. Book one is excellent, so give it a shot and ignore the hate.

name: Commerce Emperor
author: Maxime J. Durand
title: Commerce Emperor
sentence: The world is up for sale, and Robin Waybright, the chosen hero Merchant, is making an offer.
description: Pseudo-mercantile progression where Robin becomes the Merchant hero.

name: Traveller's Trial
author: Chikao J
title: Traveller's Trial
sentence: Koji Athame left his house for the first time in five years... and has a terrible day of it.
description: Tutorial focused LitRPG system-apocalypse following a shut-in having a bad day.

name: Dungeon Tour Guide
author: Aaron Shih
title: Dungeon Tour Guide
sentence: Lucas used to delve dungeons. Now, he has to run one.
description: LitRPG dungeon-core / human avatar hybrid where an isekai'd MC has to make the best of being dungeonbound.

name: Divine Dungeon
author: Dakota Krout
title: Divine Dungeon
sentence: A powerful dungeon. A sheep-herder turned Noble. Their path to ascendance through cultivation.
description: LitRPG. Great into to dungeon core. First few books are great. The ending is a bit lacking.

name: Shrubley, the Monster Adventurer
author: James T. Callum and K. H. Sohmer
title: Shrubley, the Monster Adventurer
sentence: Born an outcast weakling monster. Destined to be an S-Grade hero.
description: Light-hearted monster-MC and friends struggle to become heroes.

name: Tower Apocalypse
author: Cassius Lange and Ryan Tang
title: Tower Apocalypse
sentence: Join Devin Cain, his cursed katana that hungers for blood and souls, and a class created to curse players.
description: LitRPG tower climber with a summoner-and-sword MC.

name: The Daily Grind
author: Argus
title: The Daily Grind
sentence: An IT worker finds a dungeon in his office, and gets to plundering.
description: LitRPG where an IT worker finds an office-themed dungeon in his office building.

name: Eight
author: Samer Rabadi
title: Eight
sentence: Eight is reincarnated and makes friends with an otter.
description: Isekai slice-of-life centred around Eight and the spirit he befriends.

name: The Last Physicist
author: Dominic Stal
title: The Last Physicist
sentence: A particle physicist finds himself in a magical world.
description: LitRPG, isekai/portal fantasy, with a sort-of-but-not-really scientific approach to magic.

name: Sovereign Soul
author: James T. Callum and K. H. Sohmer
title: Sovereign Soul
sentence: Deklin will become a villain to rival the gods… somebody should probably tell him.
description: Intruiging worldbuilding of multiple-isekai Magi who travel to worldshards with gratuitous fan service and pop culture references.

name: A Thousand Li
author: Tao Wong
title: A Thousand Li
sentence: Given a chance at immortality, can Wu Ying grasp the fleeting opportunity?
description: Cultivation with sect focus. Good premise, slow pacing, tends towards slice-of-life.

name: Lightbringer
author: Brent Weeks
title: Lightbringer
sentence: Kip and the Prism face down the color-wights, but who's actually in the right?
description: A great fantasy series with horrific ending. Amazing magic system though.

name: Chaos Seeds
author: Aleron Kong
title: Chaos Seeds
sentence: Richter get's isekai'd, and learns the perils of the Land.
description: Reincarnation LitRPG that takes wish fulfillment taken to ridiculous levels and throws in as many pop-culture references as possible.

name: The Dao of Magic
author: Andries Louws
title: The Dao of Magic
sentence: Cultivation. Magic. Empowering unwitting animals!
description: Reincarnation/cultivation novel. If you just want to read an incredibly overpowered protagonist and don't mind them sounding like a teenager off /r/iamverysmart, go for it...

name: Noobtown
author: Ryan Rimmel
title: Noobtown
sentence: Jim's reborn into a fantasy land with a snarky shoulder demon he hates.
description: Isekai LitRPG with the MC having a unique trait to learn anything.

name: Fifty Shades of Grey
author: E L James
title: Fifty Shades of Grey
sentence: Anastasia is manipulated by selfish and abusive lover Christian Grey
description: A book I was forced to read by the PF subreddit and I still haven't forgiven them for it.

name: Soul Relic
author: Samuel Hinton
title: Soul Relic
sentence: Determined to fix her soul, Raysha ventures out into the world only to stumble into events larger than she realises.
description: Female-lead cultivation novel with a hard magic system. A young woman with a broken soul joins her brother to find a solution in the wider world.
